storyInfo: The party accidentally stumbles into a painting, where they begin to lose their sense of self, slowly merging with the artwork. Amidst the chaos, Laios manages to communicate with the ink spirits that had attacked them, and an unexpected friendship quickly blossoms.

attributes.content: Five, four, three, two, one...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: There's the bell! Let's go!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Gkh!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Marcille, on your left!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hup!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Laios, front! Right!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hup! Hah!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Senshi, behind you! Left! Forward!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hooh! Hyah—
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Front back front right left left right!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Eyah—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Front back left front right left back!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: HIYAH—!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*... That's all the ink spirits over here handled...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Much appreciated.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Oh, don't mention it! We're happy to help with any of your troubles, considering the village agreed to take us in for a bit.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'll be off then. Promised to help plant some veggies out in the fields.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Senshi sure has gotten friendly with the locals.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Is it not the same for you, Chilchuck? Uncle Zhang told me to invite you over for a drink with him after you finished with the ink spirits.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: He should just admit he can't outdrink me and stop keeping challenging me again and again…
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: May I come over for some tea today, Dawn?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Certainly, I am available if you are.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: It's your turn to tell tales of your adventures, and I am quite looking forward to them.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Though... I do recall that when you first arrived, you mentioned that you had to save Laios's sister.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Are you sure you are alright with staying here?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: It's true that our goal is to save Falin.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's not like rushing will help us find a way to leave faster.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: And I have to admit, life is good here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We'll talk it over when the time comes. Right, Laios?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm? Sorry, what did you say?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I can't believe you weren't listening to me again!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *chuckle* Your passion for ink spirits is well-known across the village by now, Laios.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I mean, these 'ink spirit' slimes are just so interesting!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: They have fixed forms with distinct heads, bodies, and limbs! Instead of enveloping their prey's heads, they attack like other beasts! They even vocalize!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But the strangest part is how, unlike other monsters, they don't leave behind any kind of corpse, just some black water.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I told the villagers all about their weaknesses yesterday, but they didn't seem very excited.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: That's because you're the only person who cares about that sort of stuff.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...Huh, is that so?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But even Chilchuck's learned to exploit those weaknesses. The villagers can't seem to grasp them at all. Every time I see them facing ink spirits, it's like they have no idea what they're doing.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh-gkh!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: I'm starting to suspect they can even understand us...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's odd. Senshi said they're not like slimes at all. Slimes have distinct organs, after all...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I get it.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm? Did some of them slip through?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hraaagh—
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Hmm? That one looked a bit familiar... It's got a mole on its face. Where have I seen that before?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure I killed the exact same one a few days ago. Why's it shown up again?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What's going on here? ...Wait, could it have come back from the dead? I'm going to go get a better look!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Remember to be back for dinner!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...*sigh* And he's not listening. As usual.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Sorry he's like that.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Oh, it's fine.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Anyway, do you still remember how long it's been since you arrived at P'o-shan Village?
attributes.name: Dawn
Marcille
attributes.content: Of course I...

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: Hmm?
How long has it been since we arrived?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wait, wait wait wait... There's way WAY too many of you.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirits

attributes.content: We might not have been here long, but we've been killing plenty of ink spirits every day. Who would've thought there'd still be this many left?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: There are so many of them here, yet there's no sign of fighting... Could they actually coexist peacefully?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I don't see any of their young, though.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, I can't tell their genders, either. They're all adults too, no young or old. No matter how you look at it, it's no ordinary monster cluster.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hmm? Wait, where'd the familiar-looking one go?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Crap, that one spotted me!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I've got to think of a way to stop it from calling over more! I can't take them all on my own—
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh no, it's about to call out—
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Here, have some fruit!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh...haaa? Munch munch...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Munch munch...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Gkh.
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: What's that, you want more?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh, gkh.
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: As long as you don't start shouting.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Here, I was saving them as a snack, but... Look, just eat quietly, and come over when you're done. Then we can go around the back of this wall and...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You're awfully well-behaved. What's going on here?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Sneakily climbs behind the wall)
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: (Ready to pounce at apricots on the ground)
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: (Apricots pounced! Proceeds to gobble up apricots)
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: It just attacked the village, but now it's docile over a few pieces of fruit?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Nom nom nom)
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: (Bites onto Laios's pocket)
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Hmm? What're you up to now?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You attack the village, yet you don’t seem any happier when you win, and you flee when you lose. Now you're just snacking on apricots!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You do fight over food, but it makes no sense to attack the village for it—there are way more fruits in the mountains. So why attack so often just for a few fruits?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The villagers haven’t stolen your young or encroached on your territories, so where's all this hostility coming from?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wait, isn't that the one with the mole from earlier?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Take this!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Laios sends an apricot flying at the familiar-looking ink spirit, striking it right in the head with a 'pok!'
It staggers from the blow, but quickly recovers and raises its stubby arms to cover its head.
But that's when the sweet scent of apricot hits it.
Hruuh!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Wait, are you here to eat apricots too?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Here, catch.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hruuh! Hruuh!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Munch munch...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Let me have a closer look... Same mole, slightly bigger head than the rest, a slender yet forked tail...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You really are the same ink spirit as last time! I thought you were rather odd, what with your belly so full you could barely walk. Hardly a ferocious marauder!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hruuuh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Did you really come back to life?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Do you go through the cycle of life and death over and over?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: If so, that's pretty similar to our life in the dungeon.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkhuu?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: I still don't get it, though. If that's the case, then why attack the village in the first place?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Is it just to eat apricots?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Alright. This is the last of them...
attributes.name: Laios
